Hi C=EDcero 

log4j.jar should be in the lib directory, if its not, let me =
know as
there is a build error.  You can download log4j.jar @
http://loggin=
g.apache.org/site/binindex.cgi.  I hope there isn't, and
I 've not had anyo=
ne else let me know if that is the case.  If its not
included in the binary=
 distro, many apologies. (I have just downloaded
the distro, an it is in th=
e right place)

You need to make sure that you run that you run xor_train.b=
at from the
neat4j_1_0 dir as the paths in the bat file are all relative.  =
If
you're running on a unix type os, you need to make a shell script in
the=
 same vain as the bat file.

If you continue to have problems, let me know =
and I'll help you solve
them.  You could zip up your dir and send it to nea=
t4j@...,
and I'll take a look.

Cheers

Matt (author of neat4j)
=
